dcterms:description: A comprehensive dataset including a wide range of test images depicting various areas of solar panel deterioration, specifically designed for the recognition of snail trails and hot spot failures in monocrystalline silicon solar panels.
dcterms:title: Cali-Thermal Solar Panels Image Database

dcterms:creator: Roboflow
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 934 images of solar panels, annotated in Tensorflow Object Detection format, designed for computer vision projects related to solar panel inspection and defect detection.
dcterms:title: Solar Panel Infrared Images Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset used for detecting solar panels within complex backgrounds using thermal images acquired by UAVs.
dcterms:title: Solar Panel Detection Dataset
